title.rendered: How to find a good reliable Driver in Delhi?

content.rendered:
Are you looking for a personal Driver in Delhi?

One who is not only good but also reliable.

Try Helpers Near Me today and save the trouble of asking everyone for a Car Driver.

HELPERS NEAR ME (HNM) helps you find & hire legally verified workers near you. The platform uses technology and a lot of groundwork to help you connect directly with workers without any middlemen or commissions. On the other end, HNM helps the underprivileged workers of India find local employment, free of cost, directly from nearby employers like yourself. From time to time, HNM also engages with Government bodies and NGOs to spread the platform’s accessibility to as many workers all over India as possible. 

Have you ever wondered how difficult it is to find a Driver in Delhi?

It seems even tougher when you need one urgently.

Remember the last time when you were trying to look for a Driver in Delhi, what all did you have to go through?

First, you had to ask your friends & colleagues if they know someone.

Second, you had to ask their Driver if he knows any other Driver who’s looking for work.

Third, you had to leave your requirement to the nearest security guards you had come across.

And fourth, despite all this, you had to wait for a minimum of a few days till someone showed up on your doorstep or met with you.

How much does a Driver in Delhi cost? What is the right monthly salary or charge for hiring a Car Driver in Delhi?

The monthly cost of hiring a Driver in Delhi varies between ₹17,000 and ₹18,000, depending on the car to drive.

In some cases, the cost of a Driver goes as high as ₹22,000 to ₹25,000, especially if he’s driving an automatic luxury car or if he’s driving the car for an Expat.

(SOURCE – SalaryTracker)

Do you want to check the cost of a Driver? Try SalaryTracker. It is a free salary tracking tool for 100+ profiles of Workers near you.

By that time, your need for a Driver had become so urgent that you hired the first or the second Driver who knocked on your door.

And as soon as your problem of finding a Driver was resolved, you did not bother too much about getting the background verification done for the Driver you hired.

After a few days, you were sort of okay with his work. And that was enough for you to move on with your life.

One day, when he leaves again for his village or some other reason, the whole process gets repeated in the search for the next Driver.

Come to think about it, this whole process of “finding a Driver” is always very time-consuming.

And till the time you don’t find one, you end up driving yourself or managing it somehow.

Meet Helpers Near Me.

From today, you will not have to go through such a detailed process to find a reliable Driver in Delhi.

Just follow these 5 really easy steps, and you should be able to find multiple Drivers in Delhi within 5 minutes.

  1. Visit Helpers Near Me
  2. Follow the “Find & Hire Now” option.
  3. Sign in with your credentials.
  4. Search for a profile of workers around your location. HNM automatically fetches, assigns and displays a couple of best-rated workers to your search result.
  5. Select a Plan, Pay a nominal fee and Connect with every featured worker in your search result. Among them, you hire whoever you like permanently.

Once you’ve hired, pay the salary directly to the worker.

And if you do not find a relevant worker, ask for a 100% refund within 15 days of your order.

Now, compare this with all the hassle you had to go through when you were looking for a Driver in Delhi earlier – a lot of references here & there, a long wait and in the end, only 1-2 Drivers knock on the door, etc.

On the contrary, if you try Helpers Near Me, you will save all the trouble you had to go through before finding a Driver near you.

Here are 10 benefits of trying Helpers Near Me when you need to find a good & reliable Driver in Delhi:

 

1) It is Convenient & Easy to Use

You can find Drivers at your convenience at Helpers Near Me.

It is Easier, Simpler & Better. 5 minutes is all it takes to find a Driver on Helpers Near Me

3) Connect with the nearest Driver in Delhi

‘Helpers near me’ connects you with multiple Drivers available in your vicinity.

By far, this App is the most convenient way one can find a Driver from nearby.

4) Nominal fee only

In life, many things cost, but some things in life should not cost you as much.

More so when helping somebody by giving the person a source of income and a means to live a better life.

At Helpers Near Me, you can connect with multiple Drivers at a nominal fee only.

There are no additional charges beyond what you pay while placing your order.

You, as a Customer, are free to hire whoever you like. You can hire just one or even 1-2 of them if you have more cars at your place.

5) Find your Driver from a vast pool of people

Helpers Near Me has thousands of Drivers registered on its platform.

They’ve all become a part of Helpers Near Me willingly so that they can contact nearby Employers directly, without any middlemen in between.

So, when you look for a Driver in Delhi at Helpers Near Me, you get to connect with the best and the nearest ones to you.

6) Professionally Verified Drivers only

Helpers Near Me follows a 2/3 Step Verification Process for every Driver registered on its platform.

Every Driver’s ID & Criminal/Court record gets checked in detail.

And at a nominal fee of Rs.199/-, you also get access to the detailed report on the Driver’s background, which is sent to your email address.

This kind of professional check not only ensures faith for the Driver but also provides the necessary security to you as a Customer.

7) Choice of finding multiple Drivers in Delhi

With every search, Helpers Near Me connects you with multiple Drivers from around your search location.

Imagine connecting to several Drivers at the touch of a few buttons only.

And since your requirements from your Driver is very personal to you, the platform lets you call & connect with all the Drivers.

Directly connecting with the nearby driver in Delhi makes it easier for you to discuss your specific requirements with all of them.

Even the salary part is left in between You & the Driver to decide so that you get to find one who fits your budget. Likewise, the Driver gets the salary that he wants.

This process ensures you pick the best reliable Driver among the connects provided.

8) Free of Cost for Drivers

Every Driver registered at Helpers Near Me comes on board without paying any money to anyone in between.

Helpers Near Me offers a ‘Free of Cost’ service for the Driver & all the other workers registered on the platform.

Likewise, it is a service that is available to You at a very nominal fee.

9) No Agents, Agencies or Contractors in between

There are no middlemen involved in the entire process of connecting the Drivers to You.

Helpers Near Me never works as an Agent or a Contractor with them. It is a free platform for all Unorganized Workers (Drivers, in this case).

They can become a part of the system and connect directly with nearby Employers (You, in this case).

10) Social Enablement to the Drivers

Helpers Near Me strives to provide Drivers & other Helpers with a professional way to find Work Opportunities.

In many cities, helpers pay a hefty commission to agents & contractors to get some work.

But when they register at Helpers Near Me, they get Work Opportunities directly from the Customers (You, in this case) without paying anyone in between.

This process saves them a lot of time, money and energy for them as well.

Imagine this convenience on your mobile phone and finding a reliable Driver in Delhi so easily in just 5 minutes.

This sort of comfort solves all the trouble you had to take otherwise to find a Driver.

So, next time you need to find a Driver in Delhi, try Helpers Near Me.

By far, Helpers Near Me is the easiest way you can find a good reliable Driver near you.

Along with Drivers, Helpers near me has many others registered on its platform who work at Homes, Offices & Small Businesses, like Maids, Cooks, Babysitters, Security Guards, Beauticians for your Parlour business, Helpers for Elders, Car Washers and many others.

Quick Links:

To find & hire workers near you, try Helpers Near Me.

Try SalaryTracker. It is a free salary tracking tool for 100+ profiles of Workers near you.

Refer to some of our Customer Reviews. Find what they have to say about Helpers Near Me.

Legally Verify the credentials of your Maid, Driver, Security Guards, Babysitters, Cooks, Gardener or any other workers. Try the Professional Verification Services of Helpers Near Me.

Want to get quick answers to some of your questions? Read our FAQs section.

We recommend hiring workers from Helpers Near Me. Here’s why:

Helpers Near Me uses technology and a lot of groundwork to help you connect directly with workers without any middlemen or commissions.

On one end, HNM helps the underprivileged workers of India find local employment, free of cost, directly from nearby employers like yourself. On the other, the digital infrastructure built around HNM makes it easy, quick, reliable & affordable for anyone to find & hire 100+ profiles of nearby workers.

With a vision to end poverty, forced labour, worker exploitation, and human trafficking, HNM is working towards building an unbiased and inclusive digital ecosystem where the underprivileged workforce of India can join the platform easily and access local employment free of cost, with or without smartphones.

HNM believes having enough local employment opportunities allows the workers to find a better working environment, better salaries and a chance to improve their and their families’ quality of life.

From time to time, HNM also engages with Government bodies and NGOs to make the platform accessible to as many workers in India as possible.

Find how many Workers have joined the movement to connect with YOU directly.

Many of the workers have also received local employment opportunities.
